text: Napaolo ni Nabanaba yahovaanyihana ni attu vachulhu yoyo mwaha uyo chinene. Wamalheke ukohanachiya nkayooniya wiira Napaolo ni Nabanaba vamoka ni attu arumelhenlhe akina o Uantiokiya arwee Uyerusalemu uwoonani akarumiya ni ashulhupalhe o nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo wo yoyo nlhatu uyo.
